wpt.name: GC1NX9X
wpt.desc: I see..... Exton by Libr@ryL@dy, Traditional Cache (1/1)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: I see..... Exton
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description: Have a seat and enjoy the view.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The first time we drove through here, my DD said, "Wow, I bet you can see all the way to Philly....... No, but, I see....... Exton!" Park at the top and walk down. Or park at the bottom and walk up. When you get to the middle, sit a while and enjoy. Considering where you have found yourself, you are looking for the usual, so you know to BYOP. It's not hard to find; you're really just here to enjoy the view.
Congratulations to Riggtown53 for FTF.

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Nice view, hadn't been up here before.
